msbt.message: I come here to unwind when the paparazzi are tailing me too closely at home, you know?
Ahhh I feel right at home here, even though this is not my home. That might be a problem.
I could totally see myself living here,

Ahhh I feel right at home here, even though this is not my home. That might be a problem.
I could totally see myself living here,
Wouldn't be camping without a campfire! Or my designer , of course.
I knew as soon as I got here that this was a place I could really establish my brand, .
I come here to unwind when the paparazzi are tailing me too closely at home, you know?
Wouldn't be camping without a campfire! Or my designer , of course.
I knew from the very moment I set foot on this island and I were going to be a perfect match, .And as a now-official resident of , I know I feel lucky to have me here.
Heya! Are you from around here? I'm kinda on vacation, just relaxing and focus-grouping a few things So far, I like what I'm seeing. 100 percent of s would rate this campground highly.
Hey, you're a local, right? The name's .<10_4 /> Ha HA! That's how I laugh. I'll be here for a little while, laughing sometimes and fake-crying other times Ah, the life of a performer
Ahoy. is my name, and traveling, , and dance are my passions three. Ha HA! Got you. I'm not THAT fancy-pantsy. My name actually is , though. See you around!
Thanks for putting me on the guest list, !Now, where can find some ?
Hey! Glad to be here. Where am I?
Hey, thanks for calling me here to the big show. Been waiting for my shot for a while now
You're probably wondering who I am and why I'm here.Well, the name's , and I'm a guest of the fabulous , .
Wondering why I'm here, eh? A certain , who shall remain nameless, invited me. Wait, I think I did that wrong.
What's down, buddy? Get it?<10_4 /> I do things a little differently. The name's ! If you want to blame someone for my arrival, go talk to , .

You know what the best part of camping is? Looking up at the night sky. I like to think of it as the biggest movie screen in the world, filled with all of the biggest stars Really hoping to get my name up there one day. Even thinking about taking an acting class soon

It's been a little while since I've been camping, so I'm really gonna let loose, . LikeI might invent a new dance move! Or a daring new type of ! Thatthat's the kind of thing you do when you're camping, right?

You ever notice how taking a step away from your everyday life makes you appreciate it that much more? And then you can't wait to get home, only to remember why you were desperate to get away? Fun stuff!

You know what the best part of camping is? Looking up at the night sky. I like to think of it as the biggest movie screen in the world, filled with all of the biggest stars Really hoping to get my name up there one day. Even thinking about taking an acting class soon

It's been a little while since I've been camping, so I'm really gonna let loose, . LikeI might invent a new dance move! Or a daring new type of ! Thatthat's the kind of thing you do when you're camping, right?

You ever notice how taking a step away from your everyday life makes you appreciate it that much more? And then you can't wait to get home, only to remember why you were desperate to get away? Fun stuff!
You know, there's nothing like in AlthoughI'm not much of a myself.What normally keeps people busy in this season? ? ? Help me!
Becoming a huge star is all about networking.One day you'll casually meet an executive producer who compliments your hair, and! You're a movie star! That's how it works in the movies, anyway.

I don't even live here yet, but I'm already thinking like a local.I can tell you where to get the best , and which beach has the best lighting for selfies. Yep, I think I'll have people call me "Cap'n ." How's it sound?
I feel like visiting this place has made me a new I'm more worldly, with a newfound appreciation for hard work.I even considered doing a little , can you believe it?
I'm a simple at heartI just want to be rich and make friends with all of the coolest and most beautiful folks around.
Real talk, <10_4 /> I think I'm gonna move here permanently! You can thank for giving me the idea, .
I'm just glamping here for now, but soon I'll be, uh<10_4 /> What's the word for permanent glamping? -ing!What I'm trying to say is that I'm moving here for real, .
You know, invited me to move here permanentlyAnd I can't think of any reason why I shouldn't. And at least one reason why I should The amazing local ! Ha HA!
I've got something important to tell you, From now on, you'll be sharing with a certain fashionable . It's me! Ha. I guess I probably made that too easy for you to figure out.

I think it's time I took this whole camping thing to the next level. Permanent camping. Except, if I'm camping forever, I'll probably eventually want more of a structure, and some furniture Whoa. Has anyone ever tried that before?
Hey, spread the news! I'm moving to !Normally I'd produce a hype video or a press release, but I'm kinda roughing it right now.
, this is so greatWhat makes it so great? Well, I'm glad I asked myself.It's the fun and the sun, the weather and the wind, the local , and the scene. It almost kinda makes me think about moving here
You should live here!
I'm glad you like it.
, I've gotten really used to the lifeI don't even want to go home. And I have -thread count sheets on my bed there!
You should live here!
Sorry to hear that.
I don't know, maybe I'm just imagining things, but I feel like everyone wants me to move here It's just this vibe, you know? Like when you can tell you're going to get the part in a car commercial.
You should live here!
I'm not sure...
Right. I guess you're not picking up what I'm putting down, eh?That's alright. I've got a good thing going back at home.All of the casting agents already have my headshot. Ha HA!

YeahI mean, it will be nice to get back to the lap of luxury.But this camping trip has definitely been something special.Maybe next time I'll bring a more cozy sleeping bag. Do they make them out of velvet?

No? I'm not gonna be cruising down the road with my hair blowing back in slow motion? Oh, I was thinking about the commercial again.Come to think of it, I might be getting a callback at any time. I should actually get home!
I'm not saying I can be bribed with fancy gifts, butSomeone on gave me something pretty cool, and now I want to move here.
You should live here!
It's just furniture.
Did you know that someone gave me a really nice souvenir as soon as I arrived here? I don't know if that's standard for or not, but, uh When can I move in?
Anytime, buddy!
Let's not rush it.
Can you believe that the folks of crafted so much cool stuff for me? Me?! A humble celebrity visitor? Can you imagine if I lived here?
Let's make it happen!
I'd rather not.
Yeah, you're right. I'm probably overreacting.Like the time someone said I was a good dancer, so I spent the next seven years studying ballet. Ha HA!
Pumping the brakes, huh? Yeah, probably a good idea, .This is like that time my hair stylist said I smelled nice, and I offered to co-sign on their time-share.
Yeah, I could see it being a bit much for some people.They want to see celebrities on the big screen, not in their pajamas. Ha HA!
